DOC.brief_summary: Every year , almost 3000 Norwegian woman diagnose breast cancer . Various symptoms short-and long-term side effect may experience , physical deterioration , reduce quality life fatigue . At St.Olavs Hospital , Trondheim University Hospital , out-patients undergo post operative radiotherapy currently offer participation group exercise training session . The main purpose study evaluate out-patient group exercise session .
DOC.criteria: Surgery breast cancer . Completed chemotherapy treatment . Radiotherapy schedule . metastatic disease pregnancy drug abuse
